Please enter your email address and we will send account details over!

Before you begin listing your amazing costumes,Please know that this app will only allow you to do just that.\nTo access all information and settings, please visit our desktop site at \n www.chrysaliscostumes.com
Please enter a maximum of 10 keywords to describe the categories in which your costume could belong to:
Tip: Have a specific costume? To increase your chances of making a sale, input the appropriate keyword with our existing list of categories here
Chrysalis charges 3% of transaction fee on the sale of every costume.
However, if you donate 5% or more of your sale to charity. We will walve our transaction fee to match your contribution.
By chossing to donate, I agree and accept Chrysalis Terms and Conditions.
Thanks you for listing your costume with Chrysalis!
